pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric and Cox-Based Estimation of Average Treatment Effects in Competing Risks // Estimation of average treatment effects (ATE) of point interventions on time-to-event outcomes with K competing risks (K can be 1). The method uses propensity scores and inverse probability weighting for emulation of baseline randomization, which is described in Charpignon et al. (2022) doi:10.1038/s41467-022-35157-w.
